name: basic_conversion
code:
define 1 flurb = 3.7 grobbles
convert 10 flurbs to grobbles

name: chained_conversion
code:
define 1 flurb = 3.7 grobbles
define 1 grobble = 2.1 zepts
convert 10 flurbs to zepts

name: reverse_conversion
code:
define 1 flurb = 5.2 quibs
convert 20 quibs to flurbs

name: arithmetic_addition
code:
define 1 flurb = 2 grobbles
compute 5 flurbs + 3 grobbles in grobbles

name: complex_expression
code:
define 1 voom = 4 zepts
define 1 zept = 0.5 quibs
compute 10 vooms - 5 zepts + 8 quibs in quibs
